Posts.Content: Mar 10, 2009 10:58PM Kahana wrote: I will be 31 in two days and just had my first mammogram today after discovering a small lump in my right breast.  Following the mammogram, I also had a sono.  The sono found the lump and the Dr said that it was fibroadenoma.  He wants to see me back in six months to monitor it with follow up sono's.  The question I failed to ask the Dr. today is can fibroadenoma's change or develop into cancer or do they always remain benign???  I felt a sense of relief at my diagnosis today but am growing concerned thinking I may not understand it all fully.  Anyone have any help for me?
Posts.Title: Can doctor see fibroadenoma on US? comeonirene Stumped
